$interpreted: Naya: Ugh...*cough*...*cough*...
Angelia: Naya, are you OK!?

Theodore: Do you understand now, Angelia? You cannot defeat me! 
So, I will give you one last chance to return to my side.
Theodore: As Princess, you can be my puppet. Through you, I will manipulate the people of the kingdom.
Theodore: Do this and I will spare her and the Sunshine Infantry!
Naya: ...*cough*... Angel, don't worry about me...
Angelia: I refuse! I will never support you as king.
Angelia: I will defeat you and guide the Kingdom back to its righteous path. That is my responsibility as Princess of the Kingdom of the Sun!
Theodore: Ignorant child! You are no match for me, be it military might or experience. How do you expect to win? You've no one left to aid you!
? ? ?: Not necessarily!
Theodore: Dylan Levon!
Angelia: Colonel Levon, Sione, you're still alive!
Sione: Colonel discovered the rune traps the moment we reached the ambush point. We managed to pull back just in time.
Sione: Despite some serious injuries, no one was killed.
Angelia: Thank goodness...
Dylan: You're right, the princess is no match for you in combat... unfortunately for you, I am.
Dagger: You want to talk military might? Plenty of bears can't wait to have a piece of you!
Dagger: I'd say the princess has plenty of support!
Sione: Most importantly, the princess cares about the people.
Sione: Someone as selfish and driven by ambition as you would never understand!
Theodore: Worthless bugs, kill them all!
Dagger: Is that the best you can do!?
Theodore: ......
Dylan: ......
Theodore: All forces retreat! Back to the kingdom!
Royal Infantry: Wait, King Theodore, they're on their last legs. Just a bit more...
Theodore: Silence! Dylan is merely delaying our advance. We have pursued them much too far.
Theodore: The tides will turn once the rest of the Sunshine Infantry arrives. Retreat now!
Angelia: Theodore!
Angelia: This war is far from over. You cannot escape defeat!
Theodore: So, my beloved niece has finally grown up...
Theodore: Enjoy this brief moment of peace while you can, both you and your little friends...
Dylan: Apologies, Princess, I let Theodore escape once again...
Angelia: It's fine. Right now we should tend to the injured soldiers.
Angelia: After a few days of rest, we will discuss military strategy and find a way to win this war.
Dylan: Yes, ma'am!
Angelia: Good. Let's return to base.
Naya: Angel, you were quite imposing back there. That old geezer Theodore looked dumbstruck.
Dagger: Been a while since I last saw you. Seems you finally learned the age-old technique of "getting angry".
Angelia: Please, you guys, stop teasing me...
Naya: Hehe, I kinda like that side of Angel.
Lio: Me too. Angel was so angry and scary back there, just like gramps.
Angelia: Don't worry. I will get stronger, but I won't be like Theodore. I will find my own way to unite the kingdom once more!
